thread.title: Stephen Colbert, Hugh Jackman to host next month's Global Citizen Festival starring Beyonce
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert, Hugh Jackman to host next month's Global Citizen Festival starring Beyonce - Winnipeg Free Press

author: The Associated Press
title: Stephen Colbert, Hugh Jackman to host next month's Global Citizen Festival starring Beyonce
text:
NEW YORK, N.Y. - Stephen Colbert, Hugh Jackman and Kerry Washington will host next month's Global Citizen Festival in New York's Central Park starring Beyonce and Pearl Jam.
Organizers announced Thursday that Salma Hayek Pinault, Olivia Wilde and Jackman's wife, actress Deborra-Lee Furness, will also co-host the Sept. 26 event.

Stephen Colbert participates in "The Late Show with Stephen Colbert" segment of the CBS Summer TCA Tour at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Monday, Aug. 10, 2015, in Beverly Hills, Calif. (Photo by Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP) 
Ed Sheeran and Coldplay will also perform at the concert on the Great Lawn.
The Global Citizen Festival is in its fourth year. The concert will air on MSNBC and stream on iHeartRadio and Tidal.
Fans can earn free tickets by taking actions to end poverty on the website globalcitizen.org. The concert is timed to coincide with the U.N. General Assembly meeting.
Past festival performers include Jay Z, Stevie Wonder, Neil Young, Foo Fighters and No Doubt.
